projects.name: WITI: Where is the ISS
projects.text: A small Project that Visualises where the ISS is at the moment on a 3D Model of Earth. Made with Threejs.

projects.name: Portfolio Page (This Page)
projects.text: Here I show you what projects I did and what technologies I use, all on a fully custom monochrome single pager.

projects.name: Reverse Job Funnel
projects.text: A simple Web Funnel to get companies to apply to me, reversing the usual order. Heavily inspired by some Job Funnels used as Instagram ads. Try it out! Maybe I am the next person on your team ;)
